channel.title: Simon S. Woo | Young Geun Kim

item.title: Revitalizing Self-Organizing Map: Anomaly Detection using Forecasting Error Patterns
item.description: Kim, Young Geun, Jeong-Han Yun, Siho Han, Hyoung Chun Kim, and Simon S. Woo. 2021. “Revitalizing Self-Organizing Map: Anomaly Detection Using Forecasting Error Patterns.” In ICT Systems Security and Privacy Protection, edited by Audun Jøsang, Lynn Futcher, and Janne Hagen, 382–97. Cham: Springer International Publishing.

item.title: Anomaly detection on Cyber Physical System
item.description: This project tried to detect anomalies in real time using deep learning error dataset. I made a simple Python module in the linked repo (click the Code button under the title).

item.title: Contextual Anomaly Detection by Correlated Probability Distributions using Kullback-Leibler Divergence
item.description: Cho, Jinwoo, Shahroz Tariq, Sangyup Lee, Young Geun Kim, Jeong-Han Yun, Jonguk Kim, Hyoung Chun Kim, and Simon S. Woo. 2019. “Contextual Anomaly Detection by Correlated Probability Distributions Using Kullback-Leibler Divergence.” Anchorage, Alaska, USA.
